name: stumptown-renderer
description: Meta package applicable to all packages
author: MDN Web Docs

scripts.postinstall: cd stumptown && npm install && git checkout package-lock.json
scripts.test: yarn prettier-check && yarn workspace cli test && yarn workspace client test
scripts.build: yarn workspace client build && yarn workspace cli start && cd stumptown && npm run build-json html
scripts.build-content: cd stumptown && npm run build-json html && cd .. && yarn workspace cli start
